statements: SELECT product_id, product_name, price, competitor_name, competitor_rating FROM competitor_pricing;
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_rating, product_id, product_name, price FROM competitor_pricing;
SELECT product_name, price, competitor_rating, competitor_name, product_id FROM competitor_pricing;
SELECT competitor_rating, product_name, competitor_name, price, product_id FROM competitor_pricing;
SELECT price, product_name, competitor_name, competitor_rating, product_id FROM competitor_pricing;
SELECT * FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_rating > 3 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, competitor_name, price FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_rating <= 2 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, competitor_rating FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND price < 100 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, competitor_name, price FROM competitor_pricing WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%' AND price >= 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC, competitor_rating DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM competitor_pricing GROUP BY competitor_name HAVING AVG(price) > 75 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_prices WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, competitor_name FROM competitor_prices WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM competitor_prices WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM competitor_prices WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT * FROM price_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM competitor_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, competitor_name FROM competitor_prices WHERE competitor_name = 'Amazon' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM competitor_prices GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(price) > 50
SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(id) AS num_products FROM competitor_prices GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY num_products DESC
SELECT product_name, price, timestamp FROM price_history WHERE price < 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM competitor_prices WHERE competitor_name = 'Amazon';
SELECT product_name, price FROM competitor_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, price, last_updated FROM competitor_prices WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' AND competitor_name = 'Walmart';
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM pricing_strategy WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%promotion%';
SELECT product_name, trend FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, product_name, price, competitor_name, last_updated FROM competitor_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM pricing_strategy WHERE id = 3;
SELECT product_name, trend, analysis_date FROM market_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_prices WHERE competitor_name = 'Company A' AND price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, trend, analysis_date, notes FROM market_analysis WHERE trend = 'Growing' AND analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM competitor_prices WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM competitor_prices ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT competitor_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM competitor_prices GROUP BY competitor_name
SELECT * FROM price_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT competitor_name, industry FROM competitors
SELECT id, product_name, price, competitor_name FROM competitor_prices WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM competitor_products WHERE id = 10
SELECT competitor_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM competitor_prices GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT product_name, price, timestamp FROM price_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT competitor_name, industry FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM Competitors;
SELECT competitor_name, product_id FROM Competitors WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, competitor_id, performance_rating FROM CompetitorAnalysis WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM SalesHistory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Competitors;
SELECT competitor_name, product_id FROM Competitors WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, SUM(new_price) AS total_price FROM Competitors c JOIN PricingUpdates pu ON c.competitor_id = pu.competitor_id GROUP BY competitor_name;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SalesHistory GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;
